subject: Football
Murders and Attempted Murders
lead_paragraph: The Connecticut state police arrested a 21-year-old man from Bloomfield, Conn., and charged him Tuesday with the stabbing murder of the Connecticut football player Jasper Howard.
snippet: The Connecticut state police arrested a 21-year-old man from Bloomfield, Conn., and charged him Tuesday with the stabbing murder of the Connecticut football player Jasper Howard.
